p: ‘Acco’ pomegranates were harvested in April during the 2019 season from Blydeverwacht Farm (33°48′0″S, 19°53′0″E) in Western Cape Province, South Africa, at the commercial maturity stage (total soluble solids: 14.02–16.61°Brix). The seeds were separated from the peels, membranes, and juice before they were thoroughly cleaned with tap water.
